meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive John Coulter Bridget O'Donnell Jerry Slowik Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6743.

td.p: John Coulter, a creative director from Henderson, Nevada
Bridget O'Donnell, a law enforcement specialist from Burlington, Vermont
Jerry Slowik, a writer from Arlington Heights, Illinois (whose 4-day cash winnings total $98,800)

tr.td: NATIONAL MEMORIALS
DYLAN SONGS IN OTHER WORDS
(Alex: ...talking about Bob Dylan.)
ROMAN ARCHITECTURE TERMS
PORTRAITS IN HISTORY
GUESS WHAT I'VE GOT?
(Alex: Each response will contain those three letters in that order.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Martin Luther King, Jr.

Jerry
')

Bridget

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Jerry
Bridget
John
(lock game)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Jerry] And he came up with the correct one--[*], for Technology, Entertainment, and Design.)
...
(Alex: He\'s good. We\'re going to need some really good... contestants to challenge him tomorrow.)
JohnWhat is NSA?
$5,001
BridgetWhat is GMC
$4,200
JerryWhat is TED?
$1,400
TED')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'This intellectual forum started in 1984, bringing together people from 3 different industries, hence its 3-letter name')

tr.td: NONPROFIT ORGANIZATIONS
This intellectual forum started in 1984, bringing together people from 3 different industries, hence its 3-letter name
Jerry
Bridget
John
5-day champion: $121,800
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
Jerry
Bridget
John

26 R
(including 1 DD),
2 W
